Shopify Slideshow Text Section

Learn how to create a Slideshow Text section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Slideshow Text section is designed to seamlessly integrate a dynamic slideshow with text content for your Shopify store. With customizable fonts, colors, and dimensions, it allows you to showcase images and videos alongside text in a visually appealing manner. This section is ideal for highlighting promotions, features, or any other crucial information that you want your customers to see.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Slideshow Text"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Launches: Use the Slideshow Text section to introduce new products with high-quality images and captivating videos, paired with engaging descriptions and call-to-action buttons.

  2. Customer Testimonials: Showcase customer reviews and testimonials with accompanying images or video snippets, enhancing credibility and trust.

  3. Seasonal Promotions: Highlight seasonal sales or limited-time offers by combining promotional banners with descriptive text and direct links to the sale collections.

  4. Featured Collections: Create a visual story for featured product collections, combining lifestyle images and informative text to inspire purchases.

  5. Brand Storytelling: Use the section to share the brand's story through a combination of videos, images, and engaging content, deepening the connection with your audience.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Text

    • Text Font: Choose the font for text content.
    • Text Size: Adjust the font size for text between 10px and 50px.
    • Headline Font: Choose the font for the headline.
    • Headline Size: Adjust the font size for the headline between 10px and 50px.

  • Colors

    • Background Color: Set the background color of the section.
    • Caption Text Color: Choose the color of the caption text.
    • Caption Background Color: Set the background color of the caption area.
    • Progress Background Color: Customize the background color during autoplay.
    • Progress Foreground Color: Set the color for the autoplay progress bar.
    • Indicator Color: Choose the color for slideshow navigation indicators.
    • Text Color: Customize the color for text and headlines.

  • Button Style

    • Button Background Color: Set the background color for the button.
    • Button Text Color: Choose the color for the button text.
    • Button Text Size: Adjust the button text size between 10px and 50px.
    • Button Padding Top/Bottom: Set the padding for the top and bottom of the button.
    • Button Padding Left/Right: Customize the padding for the left and right of the button.
    • Button Border Radius: Adjust the border radius of the button.

  • Dimensions

    • Max Width: Set the maximum width of the section.
    • Padding Top: Customize the padding at the top of the section.
    • Padding Bottom: Set the padding at the bottom of the section.
    • Padding Left: Adjust the left padding of the section.
    • Padding Right: Customize the right padding of the section.

  • Content

    • Slideshow Location: Decide if the slideshow is positioned on the left or right.
    • Headline: Configure the headline content.
    • Content: Set the main text content.
    • Link Text: Define the text for the button link.
    • Link: Set the URL link for the button.

  • Slideshow

    • Round Borders on Media: Adjust the border radius for media between 0px and 50px.
    • Subtle Shadow on Media: Enable or disable a shadow effect on the media.
    • Media Aspect Ratio: Choose the aspect ratio for media display (21:9, 16:9, 4:3, 1:1).
    • Enable Autoplay: Decide whether to enable autoplay for the slideshow.
    • Autoplay Time: Set the duration for autoplay (10s, 7.5s, 5s, 3s, 2s).

Through its wide range of settings, the Slideshow Text section offers versatile options for creating visually engaging and informative content for your Shopify store.
